data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Cuando Cubango, Angola to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cuando Cubango, Angola
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Cuando Cubango, Angola to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 130,000 souls living in the state of Cuando Cubango with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Cuando Cubango.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 99,948 lost in Cuando Cubango that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Cuando Cubango, Angola.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cuando Cubango, Angola has a population of 130,000.

We estimate Cuando Cubango has 30,052 people who might know Jesus, 89,172 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 10,776 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 30,052 believers in Cuando Cubango, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

location.name: Cuando Cubango
